movies.title: Les lycéennes redoublent
movies.originalTitle: La liceale nella classe dei ripetenti

biography.bio: Lovely and shapely blonde bombshell Gloria Guida was born into a family of Emilia-Romagna origin on November 19, 1955 in Merano, Trentino-South Tyrol, Italy. Guida moved with her family to Bologna when she was a child. Gloria started out in the entertainment business as a singer at her father's dancing place on the Romagna Riviera. Guida then embarked on a modeling career and was named Miss Teenage Italy in 1974. Gloria subsequently went on to star primarily in a slew of racy and playful Italian sex comedies made throughout the 1970's. Guida married actor and singer Johnny Dorelli on May 15, 1991. She's the mother of a daughter, Guendalina.
biography.name: Gloria Guida

biography.bio: Alvaro Vitali was born on February 3, 1950 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Amarcord (1973), Scent of a Woman (1974) and Pierino contro tutti (1981).
biography.name: Alvaro Vitali

biography.bio: Rodolfo Bigotti was born on February 11, 1956 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor, known for State buoni se potete (1983), Le lion du désert (1980) and Bosco d'amore (1981).
biography.name: Rodolfo Bigotti

biography.bio: Sylvain Chamarande is an actor, known for Mieux vaut être riche et bien portant que fauché et mal foutu (1980), Marche pas sur mes lacets (1977) and Les bidasses au pensionnat (1978).
biography.name: Sylvain Chamarande

biography.bio: Carlo Sposito was born on May 1, 1924 in Palermo, Sicily, Italy as Carlo Esposito. He was an actor, known for I zanzaroni (1967), His Last Twelve Hours (1950) and Les lycéennes redoublent (1978). He died on September 9, 1984 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Carlo Sposito

biography.bio: Ria De Simone was born on June 6, 1947 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Anna Maria De Simone. She was an actress, known for Touch of Death (1988), KZ9 - Camp d'extermination (1977) and Sorbole... che romagnola (1976). She died on November 10, 1995 in Rome.
biography.name: Ria De Simone

biography.bio: Brigitte Petronio is an actress, known for House on the Edge of the Park (1980), Pleasure Shop on the Avenue (1979) and Confessions of Emanuelle (1977).
biography.name: Brigitte Petronio

biography.bio: Rosario Borelli was born on December 15, 1927 in Cerignola, Puglia, Italy as Rosario Borrelli. He is known for his work on Rocco and His Brothers (1960), Presentimento (1956) and Giuramento d'amore (1955). He died in 2001 in Italy.
biography.name: Rosario Borelli

biography.bio: Maria D'Alessandro is an actress, known for Les lycéennes redoublent (1978), Hotel Fear (1977) and Quello strano desiderio (1979).
biography.name: Maria D'Alessandro

biography.bio: Sabina De Guida is an actress, known for Duck in Orange Sauce (1975), La fantastica storia di Don Chisciotte della Mancia (1970) and Les lycéennes redoublent (1978).
biography.name: Sabina De Guida

biography.bio: Nello Pazzafini was born on May 15, 1934 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Giovanni Pazzafini. He is known for his work on Attention les dégâts (1984), Banana Joe (1982) and Colorado (1966). He died on November 27, 1997 in Ostia, Rome.
biography.name: Nello Pazzafini

biography.bio: Paola Pieracci is an actress, known for Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom (1975), La prof et les cancres (1978) and Les lycéennes redoublent (1978).
biography.name: Paola Pieracci

biography.bio: Assunta Piersanti is an actress, known for Les lycéennes redoublent (1978).
biography.name: Assunta Piersanti

biography.bio: Clemente Ukmar is known for his work on Dottor Jekyll e gentile signora (1979), Les lycéennes redoublent (1978) and The Son of the Sheik (1977).
biography.name: Clemente Ukmar
